data.name: HomeGoal
data.value: Our goal is to provide you with a clear and professional presentation of the services, products and solutions we offer. As an established partner in the field of rail transport, we develop individual solutions tailored to the needs and specifics of your business.

data.name: HomeGoalDescriptionLi1
data.value: *Wagon - platforms type R or S for transport of various materials, such as steel products, long timber, construction machinery, construction materials, rails, concrete elements, sleepers

data.name: HomeGoalDescriptionLi2
data.value: *Open wagons type E for transport of metal waste, gypsum, bulk earth mass, ballast, fine gravel, fine ballast, coal, timber and other similar goods. There is a possibility for them to have an opening roof as type T

data.name: HomeGoalDescriptionLi3
data.value: *Open wagons for bulk materials type F for transport of ore and coke

data.name: HomeGoalDescriptionLi4
data.value: *Wagons for transport of coils type S for transporting sheet metal rolls.

data.name: HomeGoalDescriptionLi5
data.value: *Wagon - tanks for oil, chemicals and gas under pressure

data.name: HomeCertificationText
data.value: KTG EOOD is certified according to DIN EN ISO 9001:2015

data.name: CargoWagonsSelect
data.value: We have wagons from the following categories:

data.name: PartsMessage
data.value: Explore the categories that most often attract the attention of our clients. They cover the main solutions and products we offer and have been created to meet the needs of various industries and applications. If despite this you are looking for something specific or have a specific requirement, we are here to help you. Our team will consult you and guide you to the most appropriate solution.

data.name: PartsMessage2
data.value: We offer a wide range of unified parts, and through our cooperation with leading partners, we are able to provide individually developed elements tailored to your specific technical parameters and goals. Your needs are our priority. Our aim is to ensure reliability, quality and personalized service so that you get exactly what you are looking for.

data.name: ContactsAddressBurgas
data.value: 8000 Burgas, Freight Station "Vladimir Pavlov", Northern Industrial Zone, P.O. Box 553

data.name: ContactsAddressSofia
data.value: 1618 Sofia, Ovcha Kupel district, 57 Maestro Kanev Street

data.name: AboutUsParagraph1
data.value: KTG EOOD was founded in April 2010 with a clear mission to provide reliable and efficient solutions in the field of railway transport. For more than a decade, the company has been developing as a trusted partner for businesses in various industries, thanks to professionalism, integrity, and adaptability to individual client needs.

data.name: AboutUsParagraph2
data.value: Our main activity includes the sale and rental of new, modernized, and used railway wagons. Additionally, we offer spare parts for rolling stock and provide intermediary services for repair services in specialized repair facilities.

data.name: AboutUsParagraph3
data.value: KTG EOOD has a rich range of transportation means for external and in-plant rail transport of materials, which allows us to provide comprehensive solutions tailored to the needs of modern business.

data.name: AboutUsParagraph4
data.value: Our goal is to guarantee quality, reliability, and long-term partnerships, supporting our clients in all aspects related to railway logistics.
